body.script:
var siteAlerts = [{"id":3825,"title":"School Closing","body":"
As our calendar indicates, our schools, as well as all charter schools will have their spring recess as scheduled, from April 9-April 17. Teachers will again provide instruction beginning April 20.\n
Como lo indica nuestro calendario, nuestras escuelas, así como todas las escuelas chárter tendrán su receso de primavera según lo programado, del 9 de abril al 17 de abril. Los maestros nuevamente brindarán instrucción a partir del 20 de abril.\n
\n
Governor Cuomo has announced that all schools will be closed until April 15 and he will then decide the date that schools reopen.\n
El Gobernador Cuomo ha anunciado que todas las escuelas estarán cerradas hasta el 15 de abril y luego decidirá la fecha en que las escuelas volverán a abrir.","dateStart":"2020-03-27T16:06:20Z","baseGroupName":"Icahn Charter Schools","hash":"BjrcliYLL6X4JRnYdO4C6cH6Ejkq6m6koYk0XV+GJDY=","updateDate":"2020-04-01T16:55:07Z"}];

div.p: Icahn Charter School 2 Bus Company information 2019-2020
The bus company is PIONEER TRANSPORTATION CORP.
Bus Company phone number: 718-931-5450

Hard work really does pay off! Our school is fortunate enough to share that we have been named a National Blue Ribbon School! This is a prestigious award given to schools who achieve academic excellence and close achievement gaps. Additionally, this is given to schools who create a safe and welcoming environment for their students. This year we had a big celebration to honor our school, which was held in Maestros with a carnival theme. Students were encouraged to circulate the room and play games to win prizes.

em.strong: The mission of Carl C. Icahn Charter School is to use the Core Knowledge curriculum, developed by E.D. Hirsch, to provide students with a rigorous academic program offered in an extended day/year setting. Students will graduate armed with the skills and knowledge to participate successfully in the most rigorous academic environments, and will have a sense of personal and community responsibility.

div.p: ELA & Math Test postpone until further notice.
School will be closed from Monday, March 16, 2020 until Friday, April 17, 2020. School will resume on Monday, April 20, 2020.

p.strong: Chromebooks for students pickup: Parent Letter 3 16 20.doc Parent Letter Spanish 3 16 20.doc

div.div: ICAHN CHARTER SCHOOL #2, 1640 Bronxdale Avenue, Bronx, New York
ONLY PARENTS CAN PICK UP THE CHROMEBOOKS

div.p: For those Icahn 2 parents that were not able to pick up the chromebook for their child today arrangements have been made for a ONE DAY only pick up as follows:
ICAHN CHARTER SCHOOLS
1500 PELHAM PARKWAY
BRONX, NY
FROM: 9:OO AM TO 4:00 PM
